name: Les Shadoks
overview: THE SHADOKS... IT'S CRAZY...With his famous and hilarious cartoon, Jacques Rouxel invents one of the greatest "laughing pumps" in the history of television. But one day computer scientists decided to make you participate in the crazy epic of the curious little characters. So, if you have breath, nerves of steel, excellent reflexes; here is for you, the first volume of a long series of delirious arcades, where you will have to jump, fly, pump and run upside down as well as downside up!
